mapper.select: SELECT mins.id, mpub.int_id, mpub.ext_id, mins.owner_id, mint.field, mins.value, mins.value_ref_id, mins.operator_id FROM mm_i_ins mins, mm_m_pub mpub, mm_m_int mint WHERE mins.m_pub_id = mpub.id AND mint.id = mpub.int_id AND mins.owner_id = #{ownerId} AND mins.ext_id = #{extId} AND mins.end_time IS NULL
SELECT DISTINCT (owner_id) FROM mm_i_ins mins WHERE mins.ext_id = #{extId} AND mins.end_time IS NULL

SELECT mins.id, mpub.int_id, mpub.ext_id, mins.owner_id, mint.field, mins.value, mins.value_ref_id, mins.operator_id FROM mm_i_ins mins, mm_m_pub mpub, mm_m_int mint WHERE mins.m_pub_id = mpub.id AND mint.id = mpub.int_id AND mins.owner_id = #{ownerId} AND mint.id = #{intId} AND mins.end_time IS NULL
mapper.update: UPDATE mm_i_ins mins LEFT JOIN mm_m_pub mpub ON mins.m_pub_id = mpub.id AND mins.owner_id = #{ownerId} AND mpub.int_id = #{intId} AND mins.end_time IS NULL SET mins.end_time = #{endTime}
